title: A New England Nun - At the end, Louisa believes

content.question: At the end of the excerpt, Louisa probably believes that Joe Dagget had been

choices.label: a better man than she had originally thought
a threat to her personal freedom
the only man she could have loved
unwilling to stand by his promises

content.answer: a threat to her personal freedom

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
